description: Inspired by the epic, designed for everyday, and refined for the urban landscape - the Sawyer comfortably inhabits its environment.  Its Gore-Tex Infinium™ fabric is soft, quiet, water resistant and windproof. Highly breathable, it’s perfect for moving fast on chilly days. A lightweight fleece backer adds warmth without bulk, the zippered chest pocket secures your smartphone, and an adjustable hood adds protection.
name: Arcteryx Sawyer Softshell Jacket - Mens
